Class-Rogue 20 — Female Human Rogue: 20
Strength: 17 (3) Dexterity: 13 (1) Constitution: 15 (2) Intelligence: 18 (4) Wisdom: 10 (0) Charisma: 15 (2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Evil Deity: Egyptian-Set (CE)
Ability Boosts: Charisma; Intelligence Experience: 391790/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 255/510
Ability Notes:
Ability Boost: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from any)
Durable: +1 Constitution
Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Lightly Armored: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Strength)
Linguist: +1 Intelligence
Ability Boosts: 2 to distribute
Reliable Talent: Scores at least a 10 on proficient ability rolls
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 6
Feat Count: General: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Rogue (Roguish Archetype)
Feats: Ability Boost; Durable; Lightly Armored; Linguist; Magic Initiate (Cleric); Sharpshooter Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Rogue Features: Armor Proficiency (Light); Blindsense; Cunning Action; Death's Friend; Elusive; Evasion; Expertise; Ghost Walk; Phantom; Psi-Bolstered Knack; Psionic Power; Psychic Blades; Psychic Veil; Psychic Whispers; Reliable Talent; Rend Mind; Roguish Archetype; Save Proficiency (Dexterity; Intelligence); Skill Proficiency (Choose 4 from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight Of Hand, Stealth); Slippery Mind; Sneak Attack; Soul Blades; Soulknife; Steady Aim; Stroke Of Luck; Thieves' Cant; Tokens Of The Departed; Tool Proficiency (Thieves' Tools); Uncanny Dodge; Wails From The Grave; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword); Whispers Of The Dead Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Roguish Archetype: 1 selection
Soul Blades: Has the Homing Strikes and Psychic Teleportation features
Death's Friend: Has a minimum of 1 Soul Trinket available after a long rest
Ghost Walk: Can use a bonus action to gain a 10' fly Speed, impose disadvantage on foe attacks, and move through objects for 10 min once per long rest; can destroy Soul Trinkets for additional uses
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Set and fellow believers
Tokens Of The Departed: Can create 6 Soul Trinkets from creatures that die within 30'; can later destroy one to gain an answer to a question
Skill Proficiency: Deception; Insight; Intimidation; Performance; Persuasion; Religion
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 6 Performance: (cha) 8
Animal Handling: (wis) 0 Intimidation: (cha) 8 Persuasion: (cha) 8
Arcana: (int) 4 Investigation: (int) 4 Religion: (int) 10
Athletics: (str) 3 Medicine: (wis) 0 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 8 Nature: (int) 4 Stealth: (dex) 1
History: (int) 4 Perception: (wis) 0 Survival: (wis) 0
Tool Proficiency: Thieves' Tools
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Deep Speech; Dwarvish; Goblin; Infernal; Primordial
Skill Notes:
Linguist: Language (Choose 3 from any)
Blindsense: R10' Knows the location of hidden and invisible creatures
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Expertise: +6 on 4 chosen proficient skills or Thieves' Tools
Linguist: Can create ciphers (DC 24 Intelligence to decode)
Psi-Bolstered Knack: Can add a Psionic Energy die roll to a failed proficient skill or tool check, spending the die only if the modified check succeeds
Psychic Whispers: Can establish telepathic communication within 1 mile with 6 visible creatures for 1d12 hr once per long rest; can spend Psionic Energy dice for additional uses
Thieves'Cant: Understands jargon and signs known only by rogues
Whispers Of The Dead: Can gain proficiency in a choice of skill once per short rest
Combat
Hit Points: 109 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Greatclub (+9 1d8+3); Mace (+9 1d6+3); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+9 1+3)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Lightly Armored: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Cunning Action: Can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide
Death's Friend: Wails From The Grave also affects the Sneak Attack target
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 hit points from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have advantage
Homing Strikes: Can add 1d12 to a failed Psychic Blade attack, spending a Psionic Energy die if the sum is enough to hit
Psionic Power: Can use 12 d12 Psionic Energy dice per long rest and can use a bonus action to regain 1 die once per short rest
Psychic Blades: Can use a free hand to attack with a R60' magic psychic blade, inflicting 1d6+3 HP psychic; if both hands are free, can use a bonus action for a second blade attack that inflicts 1d4+3
Psychic Teleportation: Can spend 1 Psionic Energy die and use a bonus action to teleport 1d12x10'
Rend Mind: Can inflict stunned (save DC 15 Wisdom ends) for 1 min with a Psychic Blade Sneak Attack once per long rest; can spend 3 Psionic Energy dice per additional use
Sharpshooter: Suffers no disadvantage on attacks at long range/Ranged attacks ignore 3/4 cover/Can make a -5 attack with a ranged weapon to inflict +10 damage
Sneak Attack: Inflicts +10d6 HP on attacks with advantage or on a foe threatened by another adjacent creature once per turn
Steady Aim: Can use a bonus action and forego move to gain advantage on an attack
Stroke Of Luck: Can change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check once per short rest
Tokens Of The Departed: After a Sneak Attack hit, destroying a Soul Trinket gives an immediate Wails From The Grave use
Uncanny Dodge: Can use a reaction to reduce the damage taken from an attack by half
Wails From The Grave: R30' After a Sneak Attack hit, can inflict 5d6 HP necrotic on another target 6 times per long rest
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 10; Strength: 3; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Tokens Of The Departed: Has advantage on Constitution and saves vs. death while in possession of a Soul Trinket
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1 Attack: C: 6 Spell DC: C: 14
Spells:
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Shield Of Faith (C1 Abju): R60' Target gains +2 AC for concentration up to 10 min
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Psychic Veil: Can become invisible for 1 hr once per long rest; inflicting damage or forcing a saving throw ends; can spend Psionic Energy dice for additional uses
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
